item.description:
I am a current graduate student studying Data Science for Public Policy at Georgetown University. Skilled in computational social science research, machine learning (supervised and unsupervised), causal inference, data visualization, and administrative data governance. Experienced in the postsecondary sector through appointments at SHEEO, AIR, and College Transitions.

My mission is to leverage my data science and technical background for the public good, and increase postsecondary attainment as a result.

CV can be downloaded here.
